title: KP Governor, CM call on PM; Ghazanfar Bilour joins PTI
content:
ISLAMABAD, Dec 14 (APP): Governor Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Shah Farman and Chief Minister Mehmood Khan called on Prime Minister Imran Khan here on Tuesday.
Renowned political figure from Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Ghazanfar Bilour, who was also present in the meeting, announced to join Pakistan Tehrik-e-Insaf (PTI).
The Prime Minister welcomed Ghazanfar Bilour in the PTI.
During the meeting, political situation in Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, progress of the ongoing development projects and the measures taken to improve governance in the province were also discussed.
